I am interested in hearing how people use the query string to
constrain a G=
ET.

For instance if i want to get a list of cars registered between
03/200=
0 and 09/2006 

/cars?registeredDate$from=3D03-2000&registeredDate$to=3D09-=
2006
/cars?registeredDate!from=3D03-2000&registeredDate!to=3D09-2006
/cars?=
registeredDate=3D[03-2000,06-2006]

How are people encoding expressions suc=
h as >, >=3D, < and <=3D within a
GET request.


cheers
